channel.title: Scripting News
channel.description: It's even worse than it appears..

item.description: By far the best thing on Facebook are the "On this day" memories. I guess that means Facebook is winding down?

source:outline.text: By far the best thing on Facebook are the "On this day" memories. I guess that means Facebook is winding down?

item.description: Trump is old news, really tired and troubled. The enthusiasm is gone, they would vote for him if he was nominated, but they'd rather have a fresh Trump -- Desantis. Not good news for Trump-the-person, but nothing's changed for MAGA.

source:outline.text: Trump is old news, really tired and troubled. The enthusiasm is gone, they would vote for him if he was nominated, but they'd rather have a fresh Trump -- Desantis. Not good news for Trump-the-person, but nothing's changed for MAGA.

item.description: The monthly ritual. Here are July's posts in OPML.
